thread.title: Tom Daley and Dustin Lance Black put on a united front after Olympic diver’s 18-month affair with male model was exposed
thread.title_full: Tom Daley and Dustin Lance Black put on a united front after Olympic diver’s 18-month affair with male model was exposed

author: Marcus BARNES
title: Tom Daley and Dustin Lance Black put on a united front after Olympic diver’s 18-month affair with male model was exposed
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments TOM Daley and his fiancé Dustin Lance Black showed no signs of stress as they stepped out together amidst claims the British diver had an 18-month affair with another man. 
The 22-year-old and his partner looked comfortable and happy while putting on a united front at the screening of Dustin’s LGBT rights period drama When We Rise in San Francisco. Getty Images 6 Tom Daley and Dustin Lance Black pose up at the screening of When We Rise in San Francisco 
Tom and Dustin put their arms around one another in an assured, relaxed pose as they made their way into the Castro Theatre. 
Dressed head to toe in black Tom beamed at the cameras, as he embraced his partner of four years. 
Dustin looked a little more serious, smouldering as he posed up in a denim jacket, white shirt, blue tie, black jeans and Converse. 
Their united front came in the midst of claims that Tom had embarked on an 18-month long affair with a male model. Getty Images The couple seemed comfortable and content at the event Instagram 6 Ed William claims he was involved with Tom for 18-months 
British model Edward William started chatting online with Tom after a chance meeting in the street in 2014. 
A source told The Sun: “They live near each other in London and caught each other’s eye. 
“Ed obviously knew who Tom was, and was single at the time, so sent him a message.” 
Edward was initially invited to a barbecue at Tom and Dustin’s flat in Borough, South London, and had coffees with the pair, who had recently gone public. Instagram A source claims the male model met Tom on the street and started chatting with him online Getty Images A source says the pair ended their affair in 2015 Latest TV & Showbiz 'IT'S UPSETTING' Sam Bailey feels 'sorry' for Katie Price as she 'gets accused of sleeping with men who are her friends' BABY BLUES Pregnant Amy Childs reveals fears over her unborn baby and admits she's 'panicking' about breastfeeding STRICTLY AN ANGEL Who is Sunetra Sarker? Brookside, No Angels and Casualty actress and Strictly star on Who Do You Think You Are? WHAT VIEW Kelly Brook teases fans with naked photo in the bath from her hotel in New York SCOTLAND'S FINEST Who is David Tennant? All you need to know as ex-Doctor Who star returns in Broadchurch series 3 eyes on the prize The full rundown of BRIT Award 2017 nominees and all you need to know about the night ALL IN A LATHER Rose Leslie's steamy lesbian shower romp revealed as as The Good Fight star strips naked in new series Blue steel Michelle Keegan flashes her legs as she models her new Lipsy collection and hints at move to LA JUST GRILLING Kendall Jenner flashes her gold grill as she laughs with friends following star-studded bash in London TOEWIE GATE Towie star Megan McKenna posts a video of her feet AGAIN in a fresh bid to prove that she doesn't have six toes A NEW CHAPTER Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell could bag £50,000 for reality show to follow their lives with baby Bags of appeal Gemma Collins goes on a designer spree 'up West' after showing off her dramatic weight loss 
But Tom is then alleged to have invited him round when Dustin, who he called Lance, was out of the country, leaving Ed in no doubt as to his intentions. 
Our source said: “Ed said the messages Tom sent would say things like, ‘I’m home and horny, can you come round?’ 
“Others would say, ‘Lance is away, are you going to be about?'” 
Ed is believed to have told his friends about their meetings and their relationship became an open secret within certain sections of the local gay community. Tom admitted to internet sex sessions with a fan when he was on a break from Dustin Eddie the Eagle Edwards dives with Tom Daley and wins Splash! 2013 
The insider said: "Ed told them it was a purely physical relationship with not much emotion involved. 
"He said Tom was very confident and forward with a huge sex drive." 
The Olympic diver admitted to having cyber sex with a fan while he was on a break from Dustin. 
The couple have yet to comment, but Dustin posted a cryptic photo on his Instagram page not long after the allegations came out which hinted at his state of mind. 
Staring at a rainbow in the distance, Dustin simply wrote 'Hopeful'. 
His series When We Rise documents the history of the LGBT rights movement, giving viewers some insight into the evolution of gay rights in the 21st Century starting with the Stonewall riots of 1969.
